  • Fried Chicken

10 Pc Chickenjoy Bucket

10 Pieces (5 legs, 5 thighs) of our signature crispy juicy bone-in fried chicken. Served with a side of gravy for dipping. Choose from regular and spicy.

6 Pc Chickenjoy Bucket

6 Pieces (3 legs, 3 thighs) of our signature crispy juicy bone-in fried chicken. Served with a side of gravy for dipping. Choose from regular and spicy.

2 Pc Chickenjoy w/ 1 Side

A drumstick and thigh of our signature Chickenjoy fried chicken served with 1 side. Served with a side of gravy for dipping. Choose from regular and spicy.

Chickenjoy - Fried Chicken Near Me

If Joy was a menu item it would look like this. There is no question why our Chickenjoy fried chicken has become a cult classic. Next-level crispy. Next-level juicy. Next-level flavor. Next-level joy. It’s as simple as that. Let us prepare a little joy for you. Expect to enjoy a juicy and tender piece of mouthwatering chicken, regular or spicy chicken, evenly breaded with a golden brown crust and a savory and spicy gravy on the side. Now tell me, does that not bring a smile to your face? Don’t forget to try our Chicken Tenders and Fried Chicken sandwiches as well. Now, the only thing left to do is to get ready to enjoy some fried chicken near you!
